ygData.subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] swimming skill?
ygData.msgSnippet: A check for a skill increase in sneak is done when you hit the sneak button. ... From: ug@unixgeek.com [mailto:ug@unixgeek.com] Sent: Friday, April 28, 2000
ygData.messageBody:
A check for a skill increase in sneak is done when you hit the sneak button.

-----Original Message-----
From: ug@... [mailto:ug@...]
Sent: Friday, April 28, 2000 6:25 AM
To: EQ-Monks@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] swimming skill?


Currey, Mick writes:

> BTW, I love my new Iksar monk!

I've read the sneak thing too; never tried it.

Question though:

When you get your sneak skill and train 1 point in to it, can you hit
sneak, walk up to a wall, hit autorun and go eat dinner and just have
it raise on its own? Or is the skill check made only when you hit the
button?
